statements: SELECT * FROM packaging_transportation_analysis;
SELECT package_type, carbon_footprint FROM packaging_transportation_analysis;
SELECT transportation_method, package_type FROM packaging_transportation_analysis WHERE carbon_footprint > 100;
SELECT * FROM packaging_transportation_analysis ORDER BY carbon_footprint DESC;
SELECT package_id, package_type FROM packaging_transportation_analysis WHERE transportation_method = 'Truck';
SELECT * FROM packaging_transportation_analysis ORDER BY package_type ASC, carbon_footprint DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT package_type, SUM(carbon_footprint) AS total_carbon_footprint FROM packaging_transportation_analysis GROUP BY package_type ORDER BY total_carbon_footprint DESC
SELECT package_type, transportation_method, carbon_footprint FROM packaging_transportation_analysis WHERE carbon_footprint > 100 ORDER BY package_type ASC
SELECT * FROM packaging_transportation_analysis WHERE package_type LIKE '%Box%' OR package_type LIKE '%Bag%'
SELECT * FROM packaging_transportation_analysis ORDER BY carbon_footprint DESC, package_type ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM packaging_methods ORDER BY method_id DESC;
SELECT method_name, carbon_footprint FROM packaging_methods WHERE carbon_footprint > 0 ORDER BY carbon_footprint ASC;
SELECT method_name, carbon_footprint FROM packaging_methods WHERE carbon_footprint IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM transportation_modes ORDER BY mode_id ASC;
SELECT mode_name, emissions_factor FROM transportation_modes WHERE emissions_factor < 0.5 ORDER BY emissions_factor DESC;
SELECT method_id, method_name, carbon_footprint FROM packaging_methods WHERE carbon_footprint > 0 ORDER BY method_name DESC
SELECT * FROM packaging_methods WHERE method_name LIKE '%box%'
SELECT mode_name, emissions_factor FROM transportation_modes WHERE emissions_factor < 0.5 ORDER BY mode_id
SELECT method_name, carbon_footprint FROM packaging_methods WHERE carbon_footprint IS NULL
SELECT method_name, carbon_footprint FROM packaging_methods WHERE method_name = 'Biodegradable'
SELECT * FROM packaging_methods;
SELECT method_name, carbon_footprint FROM packaging_methods ORDER BY carbon_footprint DESC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_modes WHERE emissions_factor > 0.5;
SELECT method_name, impact_value FROM packaging_methods INNER JOIN environmental_impact ON packaging_methods.method_id = environmental_impact.method_id;
SELECT mode_name, impact_value FROM transportation_modes INNER JOIN environmental_impact ON transportation_modes.mode_id = environmental_impact.mode_id ORDER BY impact_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM packaging_methods;
SELECT method_name, carbon_footprint FROM packaging_methods ORDER BY carbon_footprint DESC;

SELECT impact_id, method_name, mode_name, impact_value FROM environmental_impact INNER JOIN packaging_methods ON environmental_impact.method_id = packaging_methods.method_id INNER JOIN transportation_modes ON environmental_impact.mode_id = transportation_modes.mode_id;
SELECT method_name, carbon_footprint, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM packaging_methods GROUP BY method_name, carbon_footprint;
SELECT method_name, SUM(impact_value) AS total_impact FROM environmental_impact INNER JOIN packaging_methods ON environmental_impact.method_id = packaging_methods.method_id GROUP BY method_name;
SELECT * FROM packaging_method;
SELECT method_name, emissions_factor FROM packaging_method ORDER BY emissions_factor DESC;
SELECT package_id, method_name FROM packaging_method WHERE package_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM transportation_method WHERE emissions_factor < 5.0;
SELECT method_name, distance_covered FROM transportation_method ORDER BY distance_covered ASC;
SELECT * FROM packaging_method WHERE method_name = 'Standard';
SELECT method_name, emissions_factor FROM packaging_method WHERE package_id = 1;
SELECT method_name, distance_covered FROM transportation_method WHERE emissions_factor > 5.0 ORDER BY method_id DESC;

SELECT packaging_method.method_name, packaging_transportation.amount_transported FROM packaging_method INNER JOIN packaging_transportation ON packaging_method.package_id = packaging_transportation.package_id WHERE packaging_transportation.amount_transported > 100 ORDER BY method_name ASC;
SELECT report_id, report_date, total_emissions FROM emissions_report WHERE total_emissions BETWEEN 1000.0 AND 5000.0 ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM packaging_materials WHERE material_id = 1;

SELECT cost, method_name, material_name FROM packaging_cost JOIN transportation_methods ON packaging_cost.method_id = transportation_methods.method_id JOIN packaging_materials ON packaging_cost.material_id = packaging_materials.material_id;
SELECT * FROM shipment_details ORDER BY shipment_date DESC;
SELECT material_name, method_name, carbon_emission FROM packaging_materials JOIN transportation_methods ON packaging_materials.material_id = transportation_methods.method_id;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials WHERE material_type = 'Cardboard';
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM packaging_materials WHERE material_id > 3 ORDER BY material_id DESC;
SELECT p.material_name, c.cost FROM packaging_materials p JOIN packaging_cost c ON p.material_id = c.material_id WHERE c.cost > 100 ORDER BY c.cost ASC;

SELECT s.shipment_id, t.method_name, s.shipment_cost FROM shipment_details s JOIN transportation_methods t ON s.method_id = t.method_id WHERE s.shipment_cost BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY s.shipment_cost DESC;
SELECT r.report_id, r.report_date, t.method_name, r.carbon_emission FROM carbon_emission_report r JOIN transportation_methods t ON r.shipment_id = t.method_id ORDER BY r.report_date ASC;
